productName: Memory Sync Round 4 — Prisma Projects, Hostel Operations & Marketing Domains
overview: Extract facts from Jay's Notion workspace covering Prisma company profile, Teong Hin Industry4WRD project, Pelangi Capsule operations, Makan Moments marketing, investments, monthly budget, solar panel, AI dev stack, HRDF training, and hostel new branch expansion. Push atomic memories to Mem0 Cloud (api.mem0.ai). No code changes — purely API operations.
goals: Capture Prisma Technology company profile, products catalog, and team structure
Document Teong Hin Industry4WRD project — Prisma's biggest manufacturing client
Record Pelangi Capsule Hostel detailed operations (OTA, rates, reviews, staff)
Extract Makan Moments Cafe marketing ecosystem (social media, Canva, TikTok)
Map investments (Prudential, RHB shares) and monthly budget/savings
Each fact is atomic: one subject, one predicate, retrievable via semantic search

userStories.title: Prisma Technology Company Profile & Products Catalog
userStories.description: Fetch the 'Prisma Technology Company Profile 2025' and 'Prisma Products & Services Catalog' pages. Extract: company registration, directors, address, incorporation date, MD status, GDPM certification, product categories (Manufacturing/IoT, AI chatbot, website packages, Notion workspace management), service pricing tiers.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetch Prisma company profile and products catalog pages
Extract: registration, directors, address, product categories, certifications
Push 10-15 atomic facts about Prisma as a company
Verify via Mem0 search for 'Prisma Technology'

userStories.title: Teong Hin Industry4WRD Project
userStories.description: Fetch Teong Hin Plastic Industries pages, Industry4wrd combine, intervention fund template, and technical proposal. Extract: company background (Kluang, est. 1978), RA report status, Industry4WRD grant (70:30 matching up to RM500K), project scope (IoT/MES), Prisma's role, key contacts (Mike), MIDA funding status.
acceptanceCriteria: Fetch Teong Hin company page, Industry4wrd combine, technical proposal
Extract: company details, grant structure, project scope, Prisma role
Push 8-12 atomic facts about Teong Hin project
Verify via Mem0 search for 'Teong Hin' and 'Industry4WRD'
notionSearchQueries: Teong Hin Plastic Industries Sdn Bhd
Teong Hin Intervention Fund Template Technical Proposal

acceptanceCriteria: Fetch Pelangi summary, overview, rates, reviews summary, operations index

Push 10-15 atomic facts about hostel operations
Verify via Mem0 search for 'Pelangi Capsule'
notionSearchQueries: Detailed Description of Pelangi Capsule Hostel
